_sText:
~   ~   ~  READ ME  ~   ~    ~
______________________________________
  ~   ~   ~  Disclamer  ~    ~    ~
______________________________________

This is my first map in a very long
time. I forgot all the tools and what
they were used for. (Don't laugh at me)
Please do not troll saying it sucks,
it's to small so it fails. I only made
it for the detail and how I can handle
so much detail myself.
_______________________________________
    ~   ~   ~   Info   ~   ~   ~       
_______________________________________

This map is for a 1v1 only. I will be
adding 2 on 2 and a bigger version
of this map. This map is mostly 
only work on the detail of the map.
The detail took me a while but I think
it took the role of a Castle Courtyard.
________________________________________
   ~  ~  ~  Installation  ~  ~  ~
________________________________________

1. Go to there you installed Steam
2. Go to steamapps
3. Double Click on your account username
4. Double Click on 'counter-strike source'
5. Double Click on 'cstrike'
6. Double Click on 'maps'
7. Drag '1v1_Castle_Courtyard.bsp' into there
8. Grab or friend or by yourself and have fun!
